mdBody:
### What's Changed
* **feat!**: Breaking overhauls the pub/sub system ([#71](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/71))
* **feat!**: BREAKING update to Capacitor 5 ([#72](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/72))
* **feat!**: BREAKING Required Manual Plugin Registration ([#73](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/73))
* **feat!**: BREAKING Make WebVitals a plugin ([#74](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/74))
body:
What's Changed

  • feat!: Breaking overhauls the pub/sub system (#71)
  • feat!: BREAKING update to Capacitor 5 (#72)
  • feat!: BREAKING Required Manual Plugin Registration (#73)
  • feat!: BREAKING Make WebVitals a plugin (#74)

* **chore**: Remove mention of Cordova plugins being supported from README ([#50](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/50))
* **fix**: Don't let capacitor take over as UNNotificationCenterDelegate ([#51](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/51))
body:
What's Changed

  • fix: fix base64url conversion (#49)
  • chore: Remove mention of Cordova plugins being supported from README (#50)
  • fix: Don't let capacitor take over as UNNotificationCenterDelegate (#51)

mdBody:
### What's Changed
* **feat**: Add the ability to specify a custom LiveUpdateManager ([#35](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/35))
* **feat**: Add the ability to specify a default file to load other than index.html ([#36](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/36))
* **fix**: Make `reload` on `PortalUIView` work ([#37](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/37))
body:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add the ability to specify a custom LiveUpdateManager (#35)
  • feat: Add the ability to specify a default file to load other than index.html (#36)
  • fix: Make reload on PortalUIView work (#37)

mdBody:
### What's Changed
* **feat**: Make Portals `Bundle` agnostic ([#32](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/32))
* **fix**: Show UIAlert for registration error when presenting UnregisteredView ([#33](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/33))
body:
What's Changed

  • feat: Make Portals Bundle agnostic (#32)
  • fix: Show UIAlert for registration error when presenting UnregisteredView (#33)

mdBody:
### What's Changed
* Add SPM Support ([#28](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/28))
* Support iOS 13 ([#30](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/30))

### What's Changed
* **breaking**: Update PortalManager to be a singleton. ([#16](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/16))
* **fix**: Add cap config and cordova config urls to InstanceDescriptor ([#17](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/17))
* **breaking**: Grand Renaming ([#18](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/18))
* **breaking**: Update IonicLiveUpdates to ~> 0.1 ([#19](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/19))
* **breaking**: Clean(er) Objective-C API ([#20](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/20))
* **feat**: Adds ExpressibleByStringLiteral to `Portal` ([#22](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/22))
* **breaking**: Remove centralized Portal management ([#21](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/21))
* **fix**: Properly coerce NSDictionary to JSObject like Capacitor does. ([#23](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/23))
* **breaking**: API Alignment ([#24](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/24))
* **fix**: Make PortalsPubSub.publish non-blocking ([#25](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/25))
body:
What's Changed

  • breaking: Update PortalManager to be a singleton. (#16)
  • fix: Add cap config and cordova config urls to InstanceDescriptor (#17)
  • breaking: Grand Renaming (#18)
  • breaking: Update IonicLiveUpdates to ~> 0.1 (#19)
  • breaking: Clean(er) Objective-C API (#20)
  • feat: Adds ExpressibleByStringLiteral to Portal (#22)
  • breaking: Remove centralized Portal management (#21)
  • fix: Properly coerce NSDictionary to JSObject like Capacitor does. (#23)
  • breaking: API Alignment (#24)
  • fix: Make PortalsPubSub.publish non-blocking (#25)

mdBody:
### What's Changed
* **feat(ios)**: use `@objc` for bridge and auxiliary APIshttps://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/4
* Swift ergonomicshttps://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/8
* **feat**: Make PortalBuilder factory methods annotated with `@discardableResult` ([#10](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/10))
* **fix**: Swift Concurrency ([#11](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/11))
body:
What's Changed

  • feat(ios): use @objc for bridge and auxiliary APIshttps://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/4
  • Swift ergonomicshttps://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-portals-ios/pull/8
  • feat: Make PortalBuilder factory methods annotated with @discardableResult (#10)
  • fix: Swift Concurrency (#11)
